property.name: Damage From Bombing Done To Units Instead Of Territories
Unplaced units live when not placed
Two HitPoint Units Require Repair Facilities
notes
property.value:
By:

Michael Hoover


About:

In Labyrinth, you assume the role of an adventurer trying to discover what is in the middle of this mysterious Labyrinth out in the middle of the Great Ocean. No one who enters ever returns, so speculation runs amok!


Victory Conditions:

Make it to the center...


Special Considerations:

  • For best results, please engage the "Lock Map" option when starting the map (Menu --> View --> Lock Map)
  • Although its not enforced, it is recommended that you keep your forces together, as strange things may happen if you split up in the Labyrinth...
  • Place-holder!

Unit Information:

To Be Determined!


Credits:

  • I used Inkarnate to create the relief map - its a cool resource! Check it out at: https://inkarnate.com/
  • Unit images are used with permission and many thanks to GoldCrownGames!
  • Special Thanks to Connor Hoover for assisting with documentation, play testing, game balancing, and brainstorming good ideas
